content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Answer (a), (b), and (c).

Briefly describe laissez-faire economic policies in the Gilded Age.

Briefly explain ONE effect of laissez-faire economic policies in the Gilded Age.

Briefly describe ONE key historical similarity or difference between laissez-faire economic policies in the Gilded Age and economic policies in the Jacksonian Era.

topic.text: 6.12: Controversies over the Role of Government in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
